snippet: Mr. Kriegsman, whose long career at The Washington Post coincided with a period of growth and diversification in American dance, was the first dance critic to win a Pulitzer Prize.
abstract: Alan M Kriegsman, a longtime dance critic for The Washington Post and the first dance critic to win a Pulitzer Prize, dies at age 84.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kriegsman, whose long career at The Washington Post coincided with a period of growth and diversification in American dance, was the first dance critic to win a Pulitzer Prize.

headline.seo: Alan M. Kriegsman, Dance Critic, Dies at 84
headline.main: Alan M. Kriegsman, Who Won Pulitzer for Criticism, Dies at 84
